1b1(mdo): ma
1b2(mdo): phyug po rnams dang
1b3(mdo): blom 'i chen po rnamapa dang phyug po nas seM dang po brang 'khor ka kyi rnams dang / tshang dngan
1b4(mdo): napa [à¤½] rnam na
1b5(mdo): khyes / bkur na@/ mchod pa bya
1b6(mdo): rnam yin dang / nam mkha' yang dang / 
1b7(mdo): kye chen po rnams mchod cing / shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
1b8(mdo): bdan do ldan pa/ na bza' bas zas
2a1(mdo): gzims cha dang / ba dan dang / bstun go sos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya gro da'i
2a2(mdo): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shaka kya'i bu phruka cing nor mang ba long spyod che ba yongs su 'dzind pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
2a3(mdo): dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dka' la dkar mgur spyod do// 
2a4(mdo): de rtse zhing dga' la/ dka' mgur spyod pa las/ chungams bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam rku lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug sa
2a5(mdo): mdzes pa/ nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/ de las khong khor yug tu nya mi'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer sem
2a6(mdo): skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyu dad pas/ nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so// de nas phas dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye thu rnam pa rnams dang / ser
2a7(mdo): skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shag kya rnams kyis/ de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur date rnama' bas rgyas so// de nas de bcas pa'i brgyal ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mying ji skad
2a8(mdo): kadags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma b+hag tu / nga khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di
2b1(mdo): 'i mying nyi ma zhes gdags so zhem zer ro// de nas khye'u nyi ma par na 'tsho ba'i ma mra kanyis dang na nu mi stong po'i ma ma gnyis dang // dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsa ba'am ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gta/ 
2b2(mdo): nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gri sIng 'u dang/ gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed pas ngas te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye dag
2b3(mdo): par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang san la/ dgel zhing thams pa bzang ba bdag sa phan pa dang / gzhanas phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba
2b4(mdo): sred pa sbyin pas dka' ba/ rab tu sbyin pas mngon par dka' ba gto chen pos gnas pa zhig ko/ de nas phyi mi ye shig na/ khye nyi ma shing n+ya kro ta'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs
2b5(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyi/ sa kyis sogs par brgyan pa dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgya nad pa/ nyi ma stong
2b6(mdo): pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nos bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems de ka' ba bskyed do// dka' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
2b7(mdo): zhabs sa phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
2b8(mdo): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u nyi mas 'jigs tshogs la sba ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
3a1(mdo): mngon sum tu byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / stuka cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol da te
3a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas/ phol dmyig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhad mya brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyis pa
3a3(mdo): dang/ ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
3a4(mdo): dang bral bar gyur nas/ gsem dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam ma khal dpasag 'this du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dam spangs pa sru bur bsil bar gyu rad pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa
3a5(mdo): rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa tho ba pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la myi snga pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod
3a6(mdo): ci'i brjod pa dang / gus par smra pa'i gnas su gyur te/ de nas gang gi mi tshe dang ldan pa nyis bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe/ zam ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing spod ma zhog byas byed de/ da 'di 'di sur rdo
3a7(mdo): bu rin po che 'go bo sa thogs nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdol dang / sum mdol dag tu 'khyam pa las na/ shag kya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o// bram ze'i chus ni tshig pa'o zhes zer
3a8(mdo): to// de nas de shin tu bom par gyur nga nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song se phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sa 'go bos phyag 'tshas te/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'di skad ces gsos to// bcom
3b1(mdo): sngan 'das kyis cin ma bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsastsal da pa/ bu 'di ni seMs las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar myi nus so// de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa
3b2(mdo): dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthongs/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni ma thong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom zhes te/ me cos thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
3b3(mdo): ldan 'das sa zhus pa/ btsun pa nyims las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ma bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa sags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sad pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon che rabs
3b4(mdo): gzhan dag tu/ chogs nyid ci'i rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i sas de dag byas shing / da bsags pa na/ nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing ba sngags pa de dag
3b5(mdo): gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dgalas byas shing bsngags pa rnams ni/ phyi rold kyi sa'i khams la rna ma par smind par myi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / 
3b6(mdo): rlung gi khams la rnam par smyind par myi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang myi dge ba byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni zi nad pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smyind par 'gyur ro// lus can dag
3b7(mdo): gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud myi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smind par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ skal pa gru bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs
3b8(mdo): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rtend mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa/ su dang rtsi rnams kyi ston pa
4a1(mdo): bangs rgyas bcom sum 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen snganan rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
4a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ phung po lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
4a3(mdo): sku gdungs/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs ste/ der srog chags 'bum phrag
4a4(mdo): tu mas bkur bsti byas nas/ mtho ris dang tha rad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan rnams kyis/ spos dang me tog 'phreng
4a5(mdo): ba dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gtugs dang rgyas mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de nas re shig na myi zhig rgyal po dang / rgyal pos gtses nas sdug
4a6(mdo): sru nor bu rin po che me shes shig thob bo// de nas de dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gi char khabs la btags te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ smon lam btab pa dge' ba'i rtsa ba dang
4a7(mdo): sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag kyang 'dis bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur na cig/ stond pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur da cig/ myi mnyes par byed par ma chur da cig
4a8(mdo): rang bya de ba'i sa bu sa rgyam sa 'ogs pa'i rgya pa'i stonas 'byung bar chug gi ce byas so// los san 'das kyis bka' sa la das / dge songs jigs tu sems / de'i tshe de'i dras ma chom po 'o
4b1(mdo): byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten sa bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che btags pa des na/ 'da'i mgo kho nor bu rin po che byung la rgyu de
4b2(mdo): nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing stan suka la mdzes par gyu rad te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge la slong de sbyar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges
4b3(mdo): par gnag par 'gyur ro// mas gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smyin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de
4b4(mdo): bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / mas dren ma rnams spangs sa/ las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams dpadashig la gtad par bya ste/ dge' slong khyed kyis de sngar bslab pa/ 
4b5(mdo): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lang nas dge' slong de dag yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung sa pa la mngon par stod do// gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni// 
4b6(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho zung 'khor gi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / swa rnams dang / chu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
4b7(mdo): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
4b8(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / ba dan dang
5a1(mdo): 'a rjo u ma kunas/ tho yin dga' ban de'i se rgya marnasan/ sa phyug ci rnam pa
5a2(mdo): sa longs spyod me pa yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing che ba nam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ nam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'dran pa zhig gnas pa des// rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ re de dang sman gcig tu rtse zhing dag las
5a3(mdo): dga' mgur spyod do// dag zhing dag las dga' mgur spyod pa las// chung ma la bu chag nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam chu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bza zhing bas na sdug la mdzes pa/ myi'i kha dog sas mi 'das// swa'i
5a4(mdo): kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig bcas te// gang gi tshe khye'u de bcas pa de'i tshe swa rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgreng ngo // swa'i ros mo'ichi byad dag kyang brdungs so// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma
5a5(mdo): dang / sa mu t+ya dang / pad ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gton te/ ser sna'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur da to// khyim thams cad cu yang de'i phyir ba dan steng ngo // de nas de bcan
5a6(mdo): pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mying ji skad gdags shes mying 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad du grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i mying snyan grags zhes
5a7(mdo): gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u san sngags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma sbun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis/ 
5a8(mdo): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po cog gis skyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i ning nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang stan la/ dge'
5b1(mdo): zhi bsam pa bshang la/ bdags phan pa dang / gzhan ma lan pas zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid me ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ de nas phyis me shig na/ khye'u lam mags/ shing n+ya klo nga'i kun dgal ra ba song ba dang / 
5b2(mdo): des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mchan sus cu phra gnyis kyis legs par brgyand pa/ dpe' byang bzang byu rgya chus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dos gang gis brgyan pa/ nyim song pas lhag pa'i 'odam pa' ba/ rin
5b3(mdo): po che'i rilo 'gro ba ste bu/ kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba bskyed do// dka' ba bskyed nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag pa tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom
5b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dbasam pa dang / bka la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
5b5(mdo): chos bstand te/ de thos nas khye'u stan grags kyis 'jigs chogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ 
5b6(mdo): sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byind te/ dge' sbyong dang bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / 
5b7(mdo): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol dmyig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yol zhing myi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
5b8(mdo): can yin par chad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser drang pong par mnyam pa// nam mkha' dang / 
6a1(mdo): laka 'this du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ can dang spangs pa lta bur bsimed par gyur da pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sred pa'i
6a2(mdo): rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang bkur sti la myi blta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyurd to// de yang gsol pa btab ste/ phul ba'i gos spyod de/ gsol
6a3(mdo): ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i zas dang / mal cha dang / sta nad dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong spyod de/ gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa de ni nyung ngu spyod do// de nas
6a4(mdo): dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sang / des rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis/ las gang dag bgyis na/ de btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan
6a5(mdo): bsgreb nas 'jig rten phyagrags pas rgyas par gyur da la/ rab tu gyu ba dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyu rang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ dge slong dag ldan grags nyid kyis sngon che
6a6(mdo): rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyend grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon myi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing sags pas na/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing sngags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gri/ 
6a7(mdo): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge' slong dag las byas shing bcags pa rnams ni phyi ro lang gi sa'i khams pa rnam par sbyind par myi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par sbyin
6a8(mdo): par myi 'gyur te/ las dge' ba dang myi dge' ba byas shing bsngags pa rnams ni/ zind pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ab shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams
6b1(mdo): ni// gzhas pa brgyar yang chu kyis// chogs shing dus sa bab pas// 'bras bu nyid du sbyin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ gas pa chu bcu rtsagacig pas// de bzhin gshegs pa dkra
6b2(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur da pa/ bla na myed pa sA dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
6b3(mdo): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa las me shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thas/ 
6b4(mdo): cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du/ phung po sdug ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la/ sku gdung
6b5(mdo): gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchodan kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags/ gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ des srog chags 'bum phrag tu
6b6(mdo): mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris tha rad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gi dus sond byed pa der rkyang 'gyed pa rnams kyi ba dam
6b7(mdo): bsgreng ngo // de nas re shig na rgyal po'i gyid gcig gis kyang cig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag tu ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs sem
6b8(mdo): cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der sobaste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mchod rten gi steng gi srog shing la btags nas/ smon lam btab pa/ 
7a1(mdo): bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur da cig/ stond pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur da cig/ myi mnyes par byed par ma gyur da cig ces byas so// dge' slong dag ji snyed du ses
7a2(mdo): de'i tshe de'i dus na kyang du gyur da pa gang yin pa de ni stan grags 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten sa bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor ba na bde' ba mtha' yas pa myong bar 'gyums
7a3(mdo): rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las
7a4(mdo): ka cig tungs par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang ga ngag tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam dpar sbyin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las
7a5(mdo): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ab shig/ la katad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de sngar bslab par bya'o// 
7a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' salang nas dge slong de dag yi rang se/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// kar po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las rtogs par
7a7(mdo): brjod pa ma tshogs pa zhes bya ste/ spos kyi tshogs su bcad pa 'dun pa/ rdzogs so/ 'os ni// 'od bzangs pa dang rabalcag sa// dkas mo zla ba.ud pas// mdzes sun ma dang mu tig dang / gtsang ga
7a8(mdo): 'de byed pa// ci mug me chen bdang de bas nang / 'od bzang ma zhes bya ba di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / po tha 'khor gi gyi rnams/ 
7b1(mdo): dang / tshor dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang kyis
7b2(mdo): bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa li sangs
7b3(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bzal dang / zhal zas dang / ka zims cha dang / gdan dang / spyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang su pa mnyan du yod pa/ 
7b4(mdo): nas/ rgyas bu rgyal byed kyi chas/ khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod dpan/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor sa pas songs spyod mes/ yongs su
7b5(mdo): 'dzind pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dpa'agran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang snyun gcig tu che zhing
7b6(mdo): dkalas dka' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dka' makur spyod pa las// chung mas bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam mu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bza zhing ldan sdug pa mdzes pa/ sA'i brgyan/ 
7b7(mdo): kyis klubs pa// nor bu rin po che 'gul na thogs pa/ zhig bcas te de las/ 'od byung ba des/ mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas sngond dbyas nas/ bu mo de'i mying ji skad/ 
7b8(mdo): gdags shes mying 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad sdang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di mying 'od bzang ma zhes gdag so
8a1(mdo): zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma par na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis
8a2(mdo): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dab zhun mar dang / mar gi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed rings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyu rad to// bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ 
8a3(mdo): bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su dang su 'ong yang rung ba/ de dang de dag la 'gul nas brgyan bkro sad te sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang ga che bu mo de mthar
8a4(mdo): kyis chen mor gyurd pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnam sa dang / tshong dpon gi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur da nas/ de 'i phas lag pa la om tshugs byas te bsams
8a5(mdo): pa/ gal te cig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag ki dgrar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas re shig na/ bu mo des/ pha sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci
8a6(mdo): zhig gis sems khong su chud cing bzhugs/ de nas des de'i don rgyas pam bstod do// de nas bu mo de na ye yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro// de nas tshong dpon
8a7(mdo): des rgyal po gsas rgyas la gsol nas// mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te// ba ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma/ rang nyid khyim thab 'das par chas kyis/ khyed kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so// de nas zhag 'dun
8a8(mdo): lon pa dang / bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gi rgyal mtshan bsgreb nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te/ bstod pa 'dond cing srad du zhugs so// de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams
8b1(mdo): dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la/ gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni myi 'chas/ yod ye bdag 'dod pa
8b2(mdo): narnams la don tu gnyer ba ma lags pa kho nar byas so// bdag ni sangs rgyas sa skyabs su song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo zhes byas nas/ de dag phyir log ko// bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom
8b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags
8b4(mdo): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba des bu'i chos bas nad te de thos nas bu mo 'od bza mas/ 'jigs tshogs las pa'i ri'i darje mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i
8b5(mdo): 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas// mngon par shes pa yang bsgrubs so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma/ stan las langasate// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas
8b6(mdo): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thas mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang
8b7(mdo): bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge' slong ma'i dngos po thog tu rungs/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la/ gdul bar bya ba mang po dag de
8b8(mdo): 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' la pa/ bum mongs 'khor rnams kyang sos shig/ de nas bu mo 'od 'azangs/ rgyas bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i
9a1(mdo): nang du so pa' dang / des so so nas bsams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang sa de dag gis bstsags pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dag sa brkyang ba
9a2(mdo): bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myu da du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang myi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mtho
9a3(mdo): mthong nas kyang / spu zing zhes byas nas/ sdong po phra nas bcad pa bzhin du/ rkang pas phyag 'tshal nas/ gsol gtab pa/ sru mar spyod mar skyon khyed kyis chos 'di lta dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod
9a4(mdo): 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni myi srid do// zhes byas so// de nas bu mo'o// da bzang ma nam mkha' las babs nas/ skye bo phal po che'i gung dal 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden
9a5(mdo): pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de des de rang tu phyung ste/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas so// de nas des brtson pa
9a6(mdo): dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas pos dbyig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid gsol zhing kyi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyis pa dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
9a7(mdo): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral par gyur sa nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam
9a8(mdo): nam mkha' dang lag 'this du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur da pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa// rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
9b1(mdo): thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang / bkur stil myi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyu rad to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te
9b2(mdo): the tsom thams cad gcod pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / 'gul nas nor bu rin po che 'byung sa
9b3(mdo): rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs brnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
9b4(mdo): rgal bzhin du byung sa/ gdon myi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing ba sugs pa de dag/ gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rosad gi sa'i
9b5(mdo): khams la rnam par smin par myi 'gyur/ chu li khams dang / me'i kha/ mas dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par myi 'gyur te/ las dge' ba dang myi dge' ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zi nad pa'i phung po
9b6(mdo): dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ab shig la rnam par sbyin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag ki las rnams ni// bskald pa brkyang yang chud myi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sbyin par 'gyur// dgel
9b7(mdo): slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa
9b8(mdo): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ swa dang mya rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rtend cing bzhugs pa las// re shig
10a1(mdo): na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan/ 
10a2(mdo): las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gtung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang
10a3(mdo): grags gcig yod pa zhig ba rtsigs so// de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis btsun mo dam pa rgas nas/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te/ mchod rten la phul so// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 
10a4(mdo): smon lam btab pa/ dgel pa'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang spyi nu bar bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang dgra ba sdom pa nyid thob par gyur da cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das
10a5(mdo): kyis bka' sa sad pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa ga/ nga yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das
10a6(mdo): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des gzugs bzang zhing sta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nyid se ga thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni
10a7(mdo): daltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge' slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
10a8(mdo): nams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las/ 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnas
10b1(mdo): dpas sa 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ab shig sa gtan par byas te/ dge' slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa lang nas/ dge'
10b2(mdo): slong de dag yi rangs sde/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas mngon par 'astod do// // rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang
10b3(mdo): so zab 'khor ka rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / u rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / snga ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / sngo 'phye chen po rnams kyis
10b4(mdo): bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
10b5(mdo): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa
10b6(mdo): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyas bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'gon myed zas sbyin gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gi chung ma la bu chags nas
10b7(mdo): de zla ba brgyad dam rku lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing sta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du
10b8(mdo): rab tu sdug pa zhig btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i mying ji skad gdags shes myang 'dogs par byed do// nye thu rnams na re bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na
11a1(mdo): de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i myi rab sdug ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de yang tshe rabs dran te/ bcas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa smras pa// sbyin pa byin pa mar nyung ci yang rung // zhing gi khyad par gzhi lnga/ 
11a2(mdo): 'phel bar 'gyur// de phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te/ 'jig rten du// dad pas sA myi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin/ de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas
11a3(mdo): skrag cing dngangs te myi dka' bar gyur da la/ spyi bung zhes byas nas smras pa/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni gi za mo zhig go/ des smras pa yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags so// bdag ni bu mo lags
11a4(mdo): te/ sbyin bdag sbyin par 'tshal lo// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag gron byed zas sbyin la/ bu mo de 'di skad mchilo zhes bstar ro// de nas khyim bdag de dag dgal zhing mgus rab tu dga' nas
11a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dge' slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ khyim gi/ nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs 'dond tu badrug go// de nas kang ki tshe/ bu mo de mtha dad kyis lo bdun
11a6(mdo): yon la de'i che/ pha ma la gsos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan de pas rab tu byung nas// de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / snying du sug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyungs to// re shig na
11a7(mdo): de'i chi// mu ge'i bang gcig lad pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ deng srog chags 'bum phrag tus/ bza' ba dang / btung ba skyed pas shi'o// dengar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'jos bkas
11a8(mdo): lad pa/ kun dga' bo khyod longs// rab thug ma la phan pa/ 'khor bzhi po rnams sa khyod kyis zla gsum gi bang du/ gos dang / thas dang / mas cha dang / sand dang / nad gsos dang / rgan thong rnams sus
11b1(mdo): cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po rab tu sdug ma'i thad du song nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mas cha dang
11b2(mdo): gnang dang / nad gsos dang / ban thong rnams phul cig ces bka' yus da to// de nas rab sug mas thal mo su rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bangs dpa/ spyi bos mnos nas/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so// de nas
11b3(mdo): rab sdug ma/ spyod yul kyi grong khyer blta ba'i phyir/ mnyan du yod par chas so// de nas re zhig na khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shi nad tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rab sdug ma
11b4(mdo): kar 'gro des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad te/ zla ba gsum gi bar du zhal ta pa'i las byed par bskos so// 'gon mye dra zas sbyin gis smras pa khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gis
11b5(mdo): khyod kyis bya myi dgos so// rab sdug mas smras pa/ gald te yab pa den pa mthong ba lags pa/ sa'i 'og thog thag tu sbas pa'i gter/ rnams kyang mngon tu gzigs na/ sbyar ba 'dis ngo mtshar che ba
11b6(mdo): ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du/ zhas te bgyid do// de bzhin du dge' snyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo 'phreng rgyud mo dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo 'khor gi/ 
11b7(mdo): bu drang srong sbyin dang / gna' myi dang / ri dgas 'dzin ki mas ka dang / rgyas po gsal rgyas rnams kyis kyang / skabs phye ste khyod kyis bya myi dgos so zhes byas so// de nas nags kun tu song nas/ der myi ma yin pa'i
11b8(mdo): cha lugs can dag gis kyang bskabs phye'o// de ltar bskabs phye nas/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang
12a1(mdo): sud gsos dang / sran thong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su 'artson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la myigs pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yol zhing / 
12a2(mdo): myi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par chad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa
12a3(mdo): nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyurar nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dpalag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs
12a4(mdo): pa lta bur bsil bar 'gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbu bas bco dam pa/ rig pas mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rigadapa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la
12a5(mdo): mya swa pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis ma chod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mahA
12a6(mdo): de/ chos gos zi nad nas chos gos gsold te/ lhung zad bsnams nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod pa nas// rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so// de nas rab sdug mas/ bcom ldan
12a7(mdo): 'das dpalam du 'phrad nas/ 'o brgyal myi 'tshal zhes gsolang to// de nas re shig na nags khung mu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyind nas phrol bab pa na/ brgyags kyang myed nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
12a8(mdo): bcas pa bzhugs par gsoyad to// de nas srung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu sbas pa// gsad te bsod nams dag gi rnam par sbyin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi spung zed bza' ba dang bca pa la 'ardzogs pa
12b1(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang par gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas sbas swa'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gras rims bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas
12b2(mdo): der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' yul pa/ dge slong dag bIny+dza thos kyis dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma rab sdug ma yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes
12b3(mdo): te/ the tsom thams cad gnog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo zas
12b4(mdo): cad kyis bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal pa/ dge slong dag ra pra sdug ma nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen
12b5(mdo): grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon myi za/ par 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug/ ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsasngags pa de dag gzhan su zhig kri
12b6(mdo): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bas ga sa pa rnams ni phyi rosang gi sa'i khams la rnam par sbyin par myi 'gyur// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par/ 
12b7(mdo): smi nad par mya 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang myi dge ba byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ab shig la rnam par sbyin par 'gyur ro// sus can dag gi las rnams
12b8(mdo): ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud myi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sbyin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe
13a1(mdo): so nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa lha dang myi rnams kyi
13a2(mdo): stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'ji rte nad du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na si na/ drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
13a3(mdo): rgyas 'od srung / snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol da te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ mdun du bdang nas pa ra na sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na
13a4(mdo): tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ skyed mos tshal du song nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po dag kyang khyer ro// de nas re shig/ na de'i mngag bzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gze ba khyer te/ 
13a5(mdo): rje dro'i phyi bzhin 'gro ba las/ bu mo mngag bzhug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa sam kar mthong na sa/ de dgal bar gyur te blo skyes pa/ bdag la rdo bos lan
13a6(mdo): gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la bshos gsol go ma chag sum mo// de nas des bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / bdeg pa dang / bsngos nas/ 'bras can ki gzeb bye ste/ 
13a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ zhas zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so// de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / de re shig na tshong dpon gis bu mo 'bras can gyi gze ba ga re zhes dris so// 
13a8(mdo): des smram pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal khas phus so zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gis de thos nas mchog tu la ma tshan du gyu ra to// de nas de dgan/ 
13b1(mdo): zhing mgus sa rab tu dgal nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod dang phyi nang chad/ bran mo las byung gis song shig/ khyod kyis bdag/ gnyid kyis log pa na mel tse byas pa yin no// zhes smras so// de nas des thal mo sbyan te/ khyim
13b2(mdo): bdag sa gsos pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bsand pas rab tu byung bar ci gnang zhes byas so// de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de jo bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang chos sgo
13b3(mdo): khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung nas/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bsung rab la lo rgu stong gi bar du/ zhal ta pa'i las byas te/ 'bras can dang / skyo ma dang / thug pa btud
13b4(mdo): ba dang / rtag res 'khor ba dang / 'gron du bod pa dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / chos kos srab brgya rnams dang / sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phus te/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag
13b5(mdo): gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag phus pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba da// sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su
13b6(mdo): gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i gsungar ba la rab tu byung ba thob par gyur da cig/ ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ dge la slong dag ji snyam du sems
13b7(mdo): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bu mo ma ngag bzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phus pa des na/ phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang
13b8(mdo): zhing stan sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par
14a1(mdo): ka nag pa rnams ni rnam par sbyind pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren
14a2(mdo): ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren pa rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar pa rnams 'ab shig
14a3(mdo): la gtad par bya sa/ dge la slong khyed kyis de sngar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa la nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
14a4(mdo): dkar mo zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyas po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / dpo bra ba 'khor ka myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
14a5(mdo): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / swa ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi ma ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur sti byas/ 
14a6(mdo): bla mar byas/ ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ swa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
14a7(mdo): rnams chen po dang snyan pa/ na bza' dang / 'am zas dang / gzims cha dang/ gdan dang / sun gsos dang / spun thong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 'acas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na/ shing n+ya kro da'i kun dga'
14a8(mdo): raban 'jugs so// de'i tshigs kya rnams kyin pas/ gas kya rnams shes bya ba phrug cing do sapas song spyod che la/ yongs su 'dzind pa/ yangs shing phyem ba/ nas thos kyi bu'i dodar dang san pa nam thos kyi thum
14b1(mdo): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dag las dka' makur spyod do// de de dang rtse zhing dag la sa dka' makur spyod kyang / bu yang myed bu mo yang myed de
14b2(mdo): lag pa sa om tshugs bcas nas/ bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zind kyang / bdag la bu yang myed bu mo yang myed pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu myed pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po
14b3(mdo): dbang bar 'gyur ro// snyam ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas dge' spyod dang / bram ze dang / ltas mkhan dang / mdza bo dang / gnyen dang / cha lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol pa thob shig ces de la bsgo'o// 
14b4(mdo): de nas de bu myed de bu 'dod pas gu yang dang / chu spa dang / ku be dar dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la rdzogs pa dang / sA'i khyad par ka nya na dag sa yang gsos pa 'debs te/ 'di sa ste/ kun dga' bzhi
14b5(mdo): lA dang / nags tshal gyis dang / las kyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang chu/ mdo'i lha dpa gtor ma sen pa yis dang / lhand cig skyes pa 'is/ dang / chos mthun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'breng ba'i sma rnams
14b6(mdo): la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de yang de sta ni ma yin te// gas te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang
14b7(mdo): bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 
14b8(mdo): pa ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te/ phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas de yang gsol pa 'debs
15a1(mdo): 6gab spur byed cing 'dug sa/ sems can zhig kyang / sems can gi ris shig nas shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i sgor zhugs nas// des khyim thab la smanas to// de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang mo gas te bu khyed
15a2(mdo): zhig btsas na ni segs de ma yin te/ bu mo zhig btsas na ni/ de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de btang ngo // de nas re shig na zla ba brgyad dam chu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug sa
15a3(mdo): mdzes pa/ phyi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ swa'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ gos dkar mo gyon pa/ mangs kyi drims ma gos pa zhig bcas so// de nas re shig nas shag kya sngar mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste/ bu mo zhig
15a4(mdo): bcas so zhes thos pa dang / de khros te nang du song ngo // de nas de 'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo// de nas shag kya sA dmas bu mo mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur da te/ de btsam
15a5(mdo): pali btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i mying ji skad gdags zhes mying 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di gos kar po gyon pa bzhin du btsas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i mying dkar mor
15a6(mdo): gdags so// zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo kar mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma sbun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma
15a7(mdo): brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / mar gi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis skyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyurd to// bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du
15a8(mdo): skye ba de tsamu gos de dag kyang skye ste/ dri ma can du'ang myi 'gyur la de'i lus la yang dri mas gos par myi 'gyur ro// de nas gang ga che bu mo dkar mos mthard kyis chen mor gyur da pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams
15b1(mdo): dang blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon ki bu mdo dag de srong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur da nas/ de'i pha lag pa la om tshugs bcas nas bsams pa/ galang te gcig la byin na ni/ gzhan/ 
15b2(mdo): rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re shig na/ bu mo des pa sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ smras pa/ yab ci zhig kis sems khongs
15b3(mdo): chud cing bzhugs/ de nas des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas bu mo de na re/ yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag ni 'dod pa la don tu gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la
15b4(mdo): rab tu byung gyis/ yab kyis bdag sa gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas re shig na/ de pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan ya 'das kyi bstand pa la rab byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te/ 
15b5(mdo): btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur da to// de nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas// phol da myig lnga pa'i 'khor pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yol zhing myi
15b6(mdo): brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyis pa dang srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par zad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ 
15b7(mdo): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral gyur da nas/ gser dang bor bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa
15b8(mdo): tsan dan spangs pa sa bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas skong nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur
16a1(mdo): sti la myi lta pa dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur da to// de nas dge' slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa
16a2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun ma dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na/ des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / gos dkar mo gyon pa dang/ rab tu
16a3(mdo): byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lad pa/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu rnyed cing rkyend grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgas
16a4(mdo): bzhin du byung la/ gdon myi za bar 'ong ba'i las byas shing bas dgas pas/ dkar mo nyid kyis las byas shing bas sngags pa de da gra gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag
16a5(mdo): phyi rol gis li khams rnam par smin par myi 'gyur/ chu'i/ mas dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par// sman par myi 'gyur te/ las dge' ba dang myi dge' ba byas shing
16a6(mdo): bsags pa rnams ni zind pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ab shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud myi za// tshogs
16a7(mdo): shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sbyin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i rgyu nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sarba/ 
16a8(mdo): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba// bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
16b1(mdo): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na si na/ drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rtend cing bzhugs so// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gi chung ma dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge' zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig tu
16b2(mdo): 'dug pa/ don zhig la drang srong smra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyand pa/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas
16b3(mdo): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas skrag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// chos mnyan
16b4(mdo): ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstand nas/ des dad pa ste/ dad de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa
16b5(mdo): khyim gi nang du bshos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ chos gos sra brkyang phul lo// de nas mthard kyis pha ma la gsolang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung ngo // 
16b6(mdo): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dob na gi chung mar gyu rad pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/ des dge' slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na/ 
16b7(mdo): gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du bcas so// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni/ tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ster na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni
16b8(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa
17a1(mdo): yang 'drem mar 'gyur ro// dgel slong dag de bas nalas cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ab shig la gtad par bya ste
17a2(mdo): dge slong khyed kyis de sar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de nad ces bka' ya yang nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
17a3(mdo): bam po bcu bdun pa / zla ba zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor ka myi rnams
17a4(mdo): dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lhanas sra dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams drang / nam mkha' snying rnams dang / phyi 'am ci rnams dang / 
17a5(mdo): so 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkum srir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ swA dang / klu dang / gnod kyi na dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am
17a6(mdo): tsi dang/ so 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ sa bza' dang / gos zas dang / ga zims ma dang / gdan dang / bkun gsos dang / 
17a7(mdo): 'od las/ zas ze phyag ci nor ma sas yongs spyod mepa yongs su 'dzin pa yangs gi'i mel/ nam thos kyi bu 'dor dang ldan pa/ nam thos kyi bu'i no dang 'dran pa zhig gnas
17b1(mdo): de yang rig byed gsum gi mtha da phyind te/ mying ki nam grangs shes gsal dang bcas pa dang yi ge rab tu dge ba dang / swa ba ste gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams// tshig re re nas brda sprod nus pa zhig go// de nas/ 
17b2(mdo): de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya'i/ bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do// de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dka' na dka' mgur spyod do// de ce zhing
17b3(mdo): dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam rku son pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta na stu ga ya mdzes pa ra/ yan lag dang nying sag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsam
17b4(mdo): so// de nas de bcas pa'i btsas sngon byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i mying ji skad gdags shes mying 'dogs par byed de/ nye tu rnams na re ba dag cag gi bu tsha phas cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas ma/ de'i phyir
17b5(mdo): bu mo 'di'i mying zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo zla ba bang na 'tsho ba'i ma sa gnyis dang / mum sbun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba lim ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te sa
17b6(mdo): ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang ki pad ma bzhin du skye
17b7(mdo): drag par gyurd to// de nas bu mo zla ba mthard kyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang thos pa 'dzind par gyurd to// de nas re shig na
17b8(mdo): de'i pha ma bram ze'i khye'u rnams sngags slob pa na/ des thos pa tsam gis sobs so// thos nas kyang bstan chos de dag spag 'og dang sbyor zhing 'chang nus so// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas
18a1(mdo): par gyur to// mu legs can dag kyang nyin cig bzhin du de la sra ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang snyan cig tu gtan la khebs par byed do// de nas gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs 'i
18a2(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sngas rgyas pa de'i tshe/ mnyan du yod par gshegs nas/ mkhas pa rnams dang / mkhas par bgrang ba de dag phal cher bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir/ der 'dong bar byed do// de nas
18a3(mdo): de dag myi snang nas/ nang myi rnams la smras pa/ kye ci'i phyir bstand chos shes pa dag myi 'ong ba 'di sa rgyu ci yod de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyend pa/ shag kya thub pa 'dir gshegs te
18a4(mdo): de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra/ sngon byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so/ de nas bu mo zla bas/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ bcom
18a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dper byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa
18a6(mdo): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyand pa/ nyi ma stong pas skrag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba su bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshas te/ chos mnyam
18a7(mdo): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang / bag sa nyes dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
18a8(mdo): 'gyur ba de sa bu'i chos bstand te/ de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa
18b1(mdo): mthong nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo // de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas/ pos dmyig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor so 'di nyid g.yo zhing myi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam/ 
18b2(mdo): pa thams cad rnyis pa dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mom pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams
18b3(mdo): gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang sag 'jis tu 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ can dan spangs pa sa bur ba yis par gyur pa/ rig pas spong nga'i sbubs bcom
18b4(mdo): rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa / dpa pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang / bkur gyis kyi lta ba dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / 
18b5(mdo): kus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la/ dge slong dag khyed kyis zla ba/ phyed phyed cing so sor tha dad pa'i don bshad pa mngon par gyis shig/ 
18b6(mdo): ces bkal saHlad pa de'i tshe/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i lung 'bog tu gsos/ bdel bar gshegs pas so sor tha rad pa'i lu 'bog gsol// bcom
18b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsa dpa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ dge slong ma sa tshig re re nas chos kyi lung 'bog par myi mdzad de/ gas te khyed las lan cig smras pas/ 
18b8(mdo): 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni ngas su dbog ko// de nas de'i tshe/ dge' slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te/ bcom
19a1(mdo): ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal mo spang pa btad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// lan cig bka' sa sad pas bdag gis 'thub par 'tshal da na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
19a2(mdo): so sor tha rad pa'i lung dbog tu gsos/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor tha rad pa'i lung dpog tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par sung dpog pa mdzad nas/ lan cig bka' yuld pas/ dge slong
19a3(mdo): ma zla bas lobs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsa lad pa/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mang du thos pa rnams dang / thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma
19a4(mdo): zla ba 'di yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tso// ma thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing
19a5(mdo): bsngags pa des na/ phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzug sa bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ thos pa 'dzind/ par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ 
19a6(mdo): dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan du tshogs rnyed cing rkyend grub pa dang ldan te/ dpal rgal bzhin du 'byung ba la gdon myi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing stsags pas na/ zla ba nyid kyis las
19a7(mdo): byas shing sngags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge' slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gi sa'i khams la rnam par sbyind par mya 'gyur/ chu'i
19a8(mdo): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par myi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang myi dge ba byas shing bsngags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ag
19b1(mdo): shigs rnam par sbyin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud myi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du sbyind par 'gyur// dge' slong dag sngon byung / 
19b2(mdo): pa 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal da pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu 'tsha lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend
19b3(mdo): pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rte nad du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba ra na si na/ drang srong spa
19b4(mdo): ba'i ri rigs kyi nang na/ rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re shig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ rab tu byung ngo // des de sa lung mnos te bslabs nas/ kha ton/ 
19b5(mdo): byas te/ phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang kanas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas
19b6(mdo): so// mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyed ma nus so// de mkhan mo gapolas rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa/ 'dzind pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstand to// de nas dge' slong ma de
19b7(mdo): 'chi ba'i che/ smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gis 'khan mo zos pa 'dzind pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstand pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye
19b8(mdo): bla ma sa// bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstand pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan
20a1(mdo): 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzind pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur da cig byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa sad pa/ dge
20a2(mdo): slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i bu mor gyur da pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/ des smon lam btab pa des na/ thos pa 'dzand pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstand to// des der
20a3(mdo): lung mnos te/ bslabs nas kha ton byas pa des ni/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag ni/ las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag
20a4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dre dan ma rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dgel
20a5(mdo): slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams da 8/ las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu ngesapar dkar pa rnams 'ab shig la gtad par byas te/ dge slong
20a6(mdo): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa yad nas/ dge' slong dag de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / ud pa la
20a7(mdo): zhes bya ba ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor ki myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon nas
20a8(mdo): dang / lha rnams dang / chu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mya 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor
20b1(mdo): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ sta dang / chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci pa/ sto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa bsod
20b2(mdo): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spyan gsos dang / sman zor rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// rgyal po 'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal
20b3(mdo): phyag sa mang ka gnas pa garten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i rab kyi grong khyeran/ klu'i rgyas po ba tho / yid 'ong gnyis zad pa zhes bya ba'i dres ston dbyung ste/ de zong khyer chen po drug po thams cad
20b4(mdo): nas skye bo mang po 'dra'o// de nas re shi ka na lho phyogs nas/ zlos dkar 'khan gi slob dpon zhig 'ongs pa de'i bu mo ud pa la zhe des bya ba gzugs bzang zhing lta na stug la mdzes pa/ yan lag
20b5(mdo): dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ sang tsho dang nad myed pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa zhig yod de/ gang ki tshe/ skad mo pa'i nang du 'ong ba de'i tshe/ ltad mo pa thams cad kyis yid smon byed cing
20b6(mdo): lta bar byed de// kang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag gi yid 'phrog par byed do// der kang ka che/ dus ston byung ba de'i tshe/ rdzogs byed la rdzogs pa'i stond pa drug kyang 'ong ngo // de nas bu mo ud pa las skye/ 
20b7(mdo): bo mang po la smras pa// kye rgyas po'i khab kyi grong khyer na myir gyu rad pa'i nang na/ bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam pa 'am/ khyad du 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' ste yod dam/ skye bo mang pos smras pa
20b8(mdo): dge sbyong ko'u ta la 'khor dang bcas pa yod do// ud pa las smras pa/ tsi di myi yin nas 'ond te ma yin/ skye bo mang pos smras pa/ phyi ni yin mod kyi de na thams cad mkhyend pa yin no// de nas tshig de thos nas
21a1(mdo): ud pa sa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // song nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug // gar byed cing klu sen la ros po byed do// bud byed kyi mchan ma rnams
21a2(mdo): dad / bud byed kyi rtags rnams dang / bud byed kyi brdal rnams dang / bud myed kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang stond par byed do// de sa dge slong 'dod chag sa dang sa bras pa gangs pa yin pa de dag ni rim ci bya rtos myed par gyur to// de nas bcos
21a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams gdul ba dang / ud pa la'i byed gzugs dang / lang tsho'i rgyags pa bsal pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrus mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis// ud pa la rgas shing 'khogs
21a4(mdo): 5/ go sla ba dang / so mo zhing byas su po sbyar skur bar 'gyur ba dedes bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dra mdzad do// de napa de skar smras pa'i yodas/ ud pa las bdag nyid kyi mug pas mthong das/ 
21a5(mdo): bya gzugs dpa lang chos/ rgyags pa de med par gyu rad to// dgel slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams kyang skyo bar gyur to// de nas ud pa sa rgyags pa myed par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
21a6(mdo): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas/ rnag can gi lus 'di las/ tshegs chung ngus yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan
21a7(mdo): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang / dge' slong 'dod chags dang ma bras pa de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
21a8(mdo): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas kha gcig gis ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthong po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom pas/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// 
21b1(mdo): kha gcig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni phyir mya 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra btsam
21b2(mdo): ba nyid mngon sum du byas so// ud pa sa yang dad pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la dmyig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor bad+mo 'di nyid g.yo'
21b3(mdo): zhing myi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyis pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra ban
21b4(mdo): pa nyid mngon sum tu byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur da nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyadam pa/ nam mkha' dpalag 'this du mnyam pa'i sems dang sngam
21b5(mdo): ba/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur da pa/ rig pas spong pa'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes padang / so so yA dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / 
21b6(mdo): chags pa dang / bkur sti la myi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// zlos gar 'khan de dag gis kyang / skyo bar gyur
21b7(mdo): pa de dag gis/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus/ 
21b8(mdo): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zlos kar mkhan gi bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang lang chos rgyags pa las rgas pas skyo bar mdzad nas/ gzha' gtsang gi mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las
22a1(mdo): 'das pa'i bar du gzhag pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ dge slong dag da ltar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bras pa/ skye ba/ 
22a2(mdo): dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mya bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ya?s yongs su grol pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa// rnams pa thams cad mkhyen
22a3(mdo): pa/ ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe/ bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang / sang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs pa las skabs skyo bar byas nas/ gzha' wang gi mthar thug pa/ mya ngan las
22a4(mdo): 'da' ba'i bar du gzhag pa 'di lta bu la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/ 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang 'arnas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang // 
22a5(mdo): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang sme sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba/ dang / yid kyi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ngas/ bu mo ud pa la rgabs skyo bar byas nas/ 
22a6(mdo): brtus zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs pa rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer pa ra na si na/ rgyal po tshangs pas sbyin zhes
22a7(mdo): bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring sa 'byor da pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos gang pa/ brtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug
22a8(mdo): dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams myed pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa myed cing / tsher ma dkrugs pa/ bu kacig pa la bya
22b1(mdo): ba bzhin du rgyas srid bgrangs so// rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu che shing dka' sa/ dka' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dka' sa dka' mgur spyod pa las/ phyis btsun mo sa bu chags rlom/ de zla ba brgyan
22b2(mdo): dam rgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog bzang ba/ gser gi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs star 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral pa'i dpes che ba
22b3(mdo): snga mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ sbyin ma sdug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mying ji skad gdags shes kying
22b4(mdo): 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di'i yab yul ka ba'i rgyal po yin la/ 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing bstan sug la mdzes pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i mying ka shI'i mdzes
22b5(mdo): ldan zhes gdags so// zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u ka shi'i ma dzes ldan par na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa 'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma
22b6(mdo): ma gnyis ste/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ des pa brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po cog gis skyed bsgrangs te/ 
22b7(mdo): mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skyed drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe// de cher skyes pa de'i tshe// rgyas tshab tu dbang bsku rad to// de nas des rgyal po byed pa ni nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing / gnod pa du ma'i/ 
22b8(mdo): rtsa ba yin par rig nas/ drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo // de yang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang chus 'tsho zhing/ ri dgas kyi g.yang bzhi dang / sha ri shun gyon la/ me'i
23a1(mdo): sbyin sreg byed do// phyis re shig na/ 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba'i phyir sul zhig tu song ba dang / re shig na der/ myi 'am ci'i bu mo zhig gis/ drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas chas par gyur rad te/ gar byed
23a2(mdo): cing klu sen la/ ros mo byed do// bud myed kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud myed kyi rtags rnams dang / bud myed kyi brda' rnams dang / bud myed kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang stond par byed do// de nas re shig na/ drang srong ka
23a3(mdo): shi'i mdzes ldan gyis/ bu mo de la chos bshad de/ che zhe khyod dgas te/ khyod kying ro dang po na bstan zhing mnyan la/ 'jug ni rar por bya rad to// zhes byas so// de nos des chos de lta bu bstand te/ de thos nas
23a4(mdo): myi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa de myed par gyur/ to// de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ smon lam btab pa dkang gi tshe khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
23a5(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi slob ma ra gyurd cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na// drang
23a6(mdo): slong gzhon nur gyurd pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no// myi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ud pa la 'di nyid yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa ud pa las/ las gang dag bgyis na des/ 
23a7(mdo): gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes par gyur dasags// las gang dag bgyis na// des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis sogs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsa lad pa/ dge slong dag ud pa la 'di
23a8(mdo): nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ tshogs rnyed cing rkye nad grub pa dang ldan te/ dpal rgal bzhin du byung la// gdon myi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ ud pa la nyid kyis las byas shing bsugs
23b1(mdo): ma de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsacags pa rnams na/ phyi ro sad ki sa'i khams sa rnam par sbyind par myi 'gyur/ chuli khams dang / me'i khams dang
23b2(mdo): rlung gi khams sa rnam par smyind par myi 'gyur te// las dge ba dang / myi dgel ba byas shing bsachags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ab shig la/ rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 
23b3(mdo): ro// sus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskasad pa brgyar yang chud myi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sbyind par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bya skal pa
23b4(mdo): bzang po 'di nyid sa/ skye dgu'i cho so nyi'i thun pa nga/ sang da/ bra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldana'/ dbyed par gshegs pa/ 'jig ce na mkhyend pa/ skyes bu gdus pa'i
23b5(mdo): so sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa/ swa dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i po byang mdzes sngam martend cing bzhugs so// de nas re shis
23b6(mdo): na/ lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gi slob dpon zhig 'ongs so/ des gang ki tshe/ rgyas po mdzes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa de'i me/ zlos kam mkhan ki slob dpon sa bsgo ba/ 8
23b7(mdo): madran tu sangs rgyas kyi zlom gang shi kar thabs kyis shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis rgyal po 'i bkal spyi bos mnos te/ swa bkal ba'i sa 'chal zhes byas so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar sbyaras
23b8(mdo): legs par srungs nas / rgyal po blon po'i tshogs dang 'acas pa'i mdun du/ zlos gang gi ga thabs byas mo// de nas der zlos par mkhan gi sbom dpon nyid mi/ sangs rgyas kyi ma sugs kyis na
24a1(mdo): 'ongs so// zlos kam mkhan gzhan rnams ni/ dge slong gi cha lugs kyis nang bya 'ongs so// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing sa gu la rab tu dga' nas/ zlos kar mkhan ka slob dponas sogs pa/ zlos kar
24a2(mdo): mkhan gi tshogs rnams la nor gyi phung po chen po byin no// de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin drug byin nas/ yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa dgel ba'i
24a3(mdo): phra ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyurd cig/ mya mnyes par ma gyur da cig/ ces
24a4(mdo): byas so// dge' slong dag ji snyam tu sems/ zlos kar mkhan dag pa yin pa de dag ni/ ud pa la stsogs pa 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des na/ da ltar dkA bco
24a5(mdo): pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges klanag pa rnams ni/ rnam par sbyin pa ra gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges
24a6(mdo): par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par spyan pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar par 'gyur ro// sas 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smind pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge' slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par
24a7(mdo): gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de sngar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
24a8(mdo): ces bka' stsa sad nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po// 
24b1(mdo): rnams dang / zo po rje po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnaMs
24b2(mdo): dang / nam mkha' sde pa rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / swa ma yin dang / 
24b3(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims dang / bdan
24b4(mdo): dang / bsun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ 1na thos kyi dgel 'dun bcas pa/ ba ran sen drang srong smrabadari dgas kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe grong khyer ba ran
24b5(mdo): na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i ringal 'byor/ pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myi mang pos gang ba dang / yod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba
24b6(mdo): dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ke dang / nad rnams byed pa dang / 'brasas su dang / bu ngam shing dang / bsong dang / ma he dang ldan par 'jug ste/ gnod pa myed cing che
24b7(mdo): bkrugs pa bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du/ rgyal srid bskyangs so// de mas re shig na/ rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu che zhing dag las dga' mgur spyod do// de che zhing dka las dga' mgur
24b8(mdo): spyod pa las/ phyis btsun po sa bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lA na sngags mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / 
25a1(mdo): ldan pa zhig bcas so// de nas de bcas pa'i banas son byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i phying ji skad gdags shes kyi 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di ka shi'i rgyal po'ibum
25a2(mdo): la yims/ byad gzugs kyang bzang pas de'i phyir bu mo 'di khyig shi mdzes pa ldan sa zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes sngam ma/ pang ma 'tsho ba 'am ma gnyis dang
25a3(mdo): num snun pa 'is ma gnyis dang / dri ma khA pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad sa gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying
